sentences.en: "This is Malcolm," the girl said awkwardly, to fill the silence.
sentences.cn: 女孩尴尬地说了句“这是马尔科姆”，打破了沉默。

sentences.en: He fell awkwardly and went down in agony clutching his right knee.
sentences.cn: 他笨拙地摔倒了，痛苦地抱住右膝倒在地上。

sentences.en: He lay beside her awkwardly, propped on an elbow.
sentences.cn: 他用一只胳膊肘支着身体，别扭地躺在她旁边。

sentences.en: He scrambled awkwardly to his feet.
He stood awkwardly in the doorway, not sure what to say.
sentences.cn: 他尴尬地站在门口, 不知道该说什么.

sentences.en: I had been lying awkwardly and my leg had gone numb.
sentences.cn: 我一直以一种不舒服的姿势躺着,腿已经麻木了.

sentences.en: I landed awkwardly and twisted my ankle.
sentences.cn: 我笨拙地跌在地上,扭伤了脚踝.

sentences.en: Many modeless dialogs are implemented awkwardly. Their behavior is inconsistent and confusing.
sentences.cn: 大多数非模态对话框实现得很笨拙, 它们的行为很不一致,令人十分困惑.

sentences.en: Philip blushed awkwardly, feeling that they were making fun of him.
sentences.cn: 菲利浦脸红了,感到局促不安, 觉得她们准是在打趣他.

sentences.en: She received the answer in silence and backed awkwardly out.
sentences.cn: "她默默地听了这个答复,又狼狈地退了出去.
西蒙笨拙地拖着脚朝他们走去.

sentences.en: The autoexposure button is awkwardly placed under the lens release button.
sentences.cn: 自动曝光按钮安装在镜头脱卸按钮下面，十分不便。

sentences.en: Then he composed his features, took Godwin's hand awkwardly and began to usher him from the office.
sentences.cn: 然后他定了定神，尴尬地牵着戈德温的手，开始引领他离开办公室。

words.tran_cn: 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的

trans.tran_cn: 笨拙地，困难地，难看地，尴尬地
